android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

playstore_details.title: Love Messages for Boyfriend - Share Flirty Texts
playstore_details.description:
Romantic Love Messages for Boyfriend is a great application to express your love to your special one. It contains cute love messages, SMS, quotes, and poems. As everyone knows it is difficult to express your love with words. No worries! 'Love Messages for Boyfriend' has a collection of really thoughtful, charming and creative messages to express your feelings in a perfect way! 

Show your love by sharing romantic love messages with your boyfriend by using this wonderful app. It contains the best collection of love messages, text, quotes, romantic pics and relationship messages. Save time and effort by using our heart touching messages. A beautiful and huge collection of most romantic images, cards and heart images for display pictures. Find creative ways to say I Love You to your beloved person.

Send a really cute romantic love quote or love saying that can be motivational & inspirational to him or update your Facebook or WhatsApp status with a beautiful love message. Finding the right words for him is a lot easier now.

Guys may not be that emotional but that shouldn’t stop you from sending love messages to your boyfriend every now and then. No matter how cool you think you both are for mushy talk, you can never be too cool to tell him how your heart beats for him. 

The trick in making the puppy love in your relationship last, is to find creative ways to say 'I Love You' by sending love messages to your boyfriend!
Download this app and get inspired to send love messages to your boyfriend!


Love You Messages for Boyfriend consists of :
♥ Love MessagesBeautiful and touching SMS messages to send to your boyfriend or express your love for your boyfriend on WhatsApp, Facebook and more.
♥PoemsPerfect poems to share with your boyfriend especially when you're missing him.
♥Cute messagesThe best and creative way to say 'I love you' to your boyfriend (and future husband)!
♥ Intimate Love lettersBe the best girlfriend in the world and make your relationship more beautiful with intimate love letters and poems
♥ Accessibility Easy to navigate

Download this app now and get access to our huge collection of love messages for free! By using this app, you can share all types of status with your fiancee, boyfriend, and husband via social media sites like Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Instagram, etc.
